title: Does Congress receive remuneration while military personnel are not paid during the closure of the government?
subtitle: Unlike military remuneration, which is paid annually, the salaries of members of the House of Representatives and the Senate are guaranteed under the United States Constitution, even during the closure.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Members of Congress continue to receive their salaries, but military personnel do not receive them during the closing of the U.S. government.
